  • Constructor Details

    • BulletZoneData

      public BulletZoneData(String url, String username, String password)
      Opens the database at the specified URL and initializes internal structures
      Parameters:
      url - URL for the database, usually in the form "jdbc:mysql://server-name.com:3306/database-name"
      username - Username with appropriate access to the database specified by url
      password - Password for the user specified by username

    • BulletZoneData

      public BulletZoneData()
      Opens an in-memory database (for testing purposes) and initializes internal structures

  • Method Details

    • refresh

      public void refresh()
      Re-initializes the internal data structures from the database (primarily for testing purposes)

    • listTables

      public void listTables()
      Lists the names of all tables in the currently open database to System.out, one per line. This is intended to be a debugging method only.

    • rebuildData

      public void rebuildData()
      Drops all tables (WHICH DESTROYS ALL EXISTING DATA!!), then rebuilds it by calling the initializeData method.

    • getConnection

      public Connection getConnection()
      Method for getting an appropriate database connection. Intended to be package-level, but public to allow for related packages to access it.
      Returns:
      Connection to SQL database that can be used for further queries. Note that the caller should close the connection when finished.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
